name: iparty
description: Family party game with points-to-cash conversion

scripts.start: echo 'Starting iParty...' && echo 'Server: http://localhost:3001' && echo 'Client: http://localhost:5173' && echo '' && echo 'Open TWO terminal windows:' && echo '1. Run: cd server && npm start' && echo '2. Run: cd client && npm run dev'
